publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1432# Bill Butler: Blairdardie Boys Football Club-That the Parliament congratulates Blairdardie Boys Football Club on their recent triumph in winning the Summer Cup Final at Glasgow Green; recognises the achievements of the club over the last three years in gaining promotion twice; hopes that the players and staff of Blairdardie Boys Football Club enjoy their trip to Hampden Park later this month to be presented with the cup and their medals, and thanks the manager, Brian Graham, and all of the other volunteers who help run the club and provide football opportunities for young people in the Blairdardie area of Glasgow.

S2M-1432 Bill Butler: Blairdardie Boys Football Club-That the Parliament congratulates Blairdardie Boys Football Club on their recent triumph in winning the Summer Cup Final at Glasgow Green; recognises the achievements of the club over the last three years in gaining promotion twice; hopes that the players and staff of Blairdardie Boys Football Club enjoy their trip to Hampden Park later this month to be presented with the cup and their medals, and thanks the manager, Brian Graham, and all of the other volunteers who help run the club and provide football opportunities for young people in the Blairdardie area of Glasgow.
S2M-1432 Blairdardie Boys Football Club (lodged on 8 June 2004) Scott Barrie*
S2M-1432 Blairdardie Boys Football Club (lodged on 8 June 2004) Pauline McNeill*
S2M-1432 Blairdardie Boys Football Club (lodged on 8 June 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1432 Blairdardie Boys Football Club (lodged on 8 June 2004) Elaine Smith*
